tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteManagementEquipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  purchase_date DATE,
  purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  maintenance_schedule VARCHAR(100),
  last_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE equipment (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  schedule_date DATE,
  details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
	equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	equipment_quantity INT,
	last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
	schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_id INT,
	scheduled_date DATE,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	maintenance_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	equipment_id INT,
	maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	maintenance_date DATE,
	maintenance_worker VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementEquipment (
  equipment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  maintenance_required BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedules (
  schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT REFERENCES WasteManagementEquipment(equipment_id),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_name VARCHAR(50),
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_equipment_id FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementEquipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentMaintenanceLog (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT REFERENCES WasteManagementEquipment(equipment_id),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_description TEXT,
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_equipment_id FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementEquipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteManagementEquipment ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255), 
  category VARCHAR(100), 
  purchase_date DATE, 
  purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  maintenance_schedule_id INT REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(id), 
  employee_id INT REFERENCES MaintenanceEmployees(id), 
  maintenance_date DATE, 
  maintenance_notes TEXT 
);
